oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Airplane View of Tennessee Eastman Company, Kingsport, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aerial view of the Tennessee Eastman Company, Kingsport, Tennessee, with a view of the Holston River.

Founded in 1920 as the Tennessee Eastman Corporation, the Tennessee Eastman Company (1951) was a division of the Eastman Kodak Company. The plant produced Eastman acetate yarn and stable fiber, Tenite, industrial chemicals and dyestuffs.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Industry; Factories; Rivers
